turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order a coffee for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where would you like to order your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where is that located?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It is located It is located on 4th Street in Colorado Springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say 4th street in colorado springs?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you for confirming that. what kind of coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What do they currently offer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they have several options... lattes, espressos, americanos, cappuccinos, macchiatos.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they also have iced coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, a caramel machiatto sounds delicious. what size would you like that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sizes are available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: starbucks coffee sizes are called tall, grande and venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a venti, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What meal do they offer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they offer, nonfat, 2%, whole, soy and almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like almond milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. would you like to add any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would also like whipped cream on that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nothing else, that is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so let me confirm your order a venti caramel machiatto, whole milk and whipped cream, is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Instead of whole milk, I'll like almond milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me correct that. i have a venti caramel machiatto, with almond milk and whipped cream. did i get it right this time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you. your coffee will be ready to be picked up in 13 minutes at the starbucks store at 4th street in colorado springs.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to you shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you, enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye.
